info.title: LotaData Events Firehose API
info.description: Obtain the location-based situational context, affinity tags and relevant correlations in real-time to improve your mobile ad targeting, to increase your app monetization and to enrich your user profiles.

get.description: Obtain situational context, categories, genres, and event keywords

parameters.name: capacityMin
parameters.description: Only include results at venues of min size

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Returns matching events starting with the specified offset (paging)

parameters.name: fromDay
parameters.description: events scheduled from this day. (ISO Date)

parameters.name: fromTime
parameters.description: events scheduled between this time and toTime. Note: You can search during 6pm to 10pm window spanning multiple days (HH:MM)

parameters.name: toTime
parameters.description: events scheduled to start no later than this time (HH:MM)

parameters.name: updated
parameters.description: returns events added or refreshed after specified date and time. Timestamp in ISO format.

max.description: Max results restriction for this request

id.description: System ID for this event. Shared by other occurrences of the event.

repeats.description: How many times this event is known to repeat

when.description: Date and time of matched occurrence

price.description: List of known prices in cents

updated.description: Creation or update timestamp in ISO format (GMT)

name.description: Name of the venue or place
